response.overview: Not everyone enjoys vanilla sex. Some guys like their action to be much more spicier as is very eagerly demonstrated in this blissfully hard-hitting bonanza from the folks at Gay Sluts. Indeed, the title pretty much says everything you need to know; with the likes of Jay Mars, Buck Wilde and James Lewis literally going out of their way to savour sadistic pleasure wherever they can find it. Of course, if you like your porn to be romantic and sensual then this probably wont be for you. If, on the other hand, you love seeing lads being pushed to the limits by tormenting bastards, then you really are in for a royal treat. All of which culminates in a veritable torrent of jizz that only serves to underline just how much these lads enjoyed it.
response.title: We Love Punishment
